org.liris.ktbs.service
Interface ResourceService

All Superinterfaces:
IRootAwareService, ResponseAwareService
All Known Subinterfaces:
CachingResourceService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CachingResourceManager, DefaultResourceManager
public interface ResourceService
extends IRootAwareService, ResponseAwareService

An interface for the manipulation of KTBS resources: creation, deletion, update, and retrieve.

All resource uris passed to these methods can be either absolute or relative to the KTBS root uri, or to the contextual parent resource of each method.

Author:
Damien Cram
